  Sets the Class.Dialog.Tone of a Class.Dialog object, which influences how

items:
  - name: Neutral

      Causes the dialog to have a blue bar on its left-hand side.

  - name: Friendly

      Causes the dialog to have a green bar on its left-hand side.

  - name: Enemy
